sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Note">83f60c3e1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbaa</category> <github_id>31</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/31</github_url> <message>gs.getProperty returns the property value as string irrespective of the type of property being accessed. But, if you are in global scope and want to return a property as 'Boolean', you can use GlideProperties.getBoolean() instead. Additionally, there is also a function GlideProperties.getInt() to return the property value as 'int'.  Credits: János Szentpáli</message> <number>TIL0001024</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-05-16 15:57:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c435d3bd1b3894108ed631d7dc4bcbf1</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-03 05:52:37</sys_updated_on> <title>GlideProperties.getBoolean()</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
